title: Medical Practical Competency Enhancement: Organizational Ambidextrous Vision and Procedural Memory Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Organizational Management Concepts and Mathematical Problem-Solving Experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concept of organizational ambidexterity (focal/peripheral vision) through mathematical structure modeling.
Learners can diagnose with over 80% accuracy the impact of procedural memory on organizational learning and problem-solving through case analysis.
Learners can interpret data analysis results using structural equation modeling and propose organizational improvement strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
